languages.text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Умерь спесь, {name}. Иремерисс была умна и опасна, и если бы я не считался с ее способностями и силой, то давно бы отправился на корм ур-гулям. Сам факт того, что она обошла меня, уже говорит о многом. И я не собирался давать ей повод устранить меня как изменника. Нет, наше соперничество, наша маленькая игра, которая длилась с самого рождения, требовала времени. Вдобавок... когда ты на вершине, тебе надо как-то разгонять скуку. Эта игра развлекала нас и держала в страхе весь кабал".

{n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Умерь спесь, {name}. Иремерисс была умна и опасна, и если бы я не считался с ее способностями и силой, то давно бы отправился на корм ур-гулям. Сам факт того, что она обошла меня, уже говорит о многом. И я не собирался давать ей повод устранить меня как изменника. Нет, наше соперничество, наша маленькая игра, которая длилась с самого рождения, требовала времени. Вдобавок... когда ты на вершине, тебе надо как-то разгонять скуку. Эта игра развлекала нас и держала в страхе весь кабал".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Controla tu arrogancia, {name}. Yremeryss era astuta y letal, y si hubiera subestimado sus habilidades y su poder habría sido pasto de los ur-ghuls hace mucho tiempo. El hecho de que me superara habla por sí mismo. Me negué a darle motivos para expulsarme por traición. No, nuestra rivalidad, ese jueguecito al que jugamos desde que nacimos, viene de lejos. Además... cuando estás en la cima, necesitas algo para contener el aburrimiento. Este juego nos entretuvo y tenía aterrado al resto de la Kábala».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Controla tu arrogancia, {name}. Yremeryss es astuta y letal, y si hubiera subestimado sus habilidades y su poder habría sido pasto de los ur-ghuls hace mucho tiempo. El hecho de que me superara habla por sí mismo. Me negué a darle motivos para expulsarme por traición. No, nuestra rivalidad, ese jueguecito al que jugamos desde que nacimos, viene de lejos. Además... cuando estás en la cima, necesitas algo para contener el aburrimiento. Este juego nos ha entretenido y ha aterrado al resto de la Kábala».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你最好别这么傲慢，{name}。伊芮梅莉斯既聪明，又心狠手辣，若是我低估了她的才能和实力，那我恐怕早就沦为了乌古尔的盘中餐。她比我地位更高，这本身就能证明她的能耐。至于我，我没有给她任何机会，让她有理由以背叛的罪名将我扫地出门。不，我们之间的竞争，这场从出生就开始的小小游戏，是场旷日持久的争斗。不仅如此……当你站在巅峰的时候，你需要找些东西来解闷。这场游戏让我们觉得很有意思，也吓坏了阴谋团其他成员。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を細めた。{/n}「その傲慢さには注意するんだな、{name}。イレメリスは賢く危険だ。もし俺が彼女の能力と強さを見くびっていたら、もうずっと前にウル＝グールのエサとなっていただろう。彼女が俺を越えたという事実がそれを物語っている。俺を裏切り者として追放しようとする彼女に、俺はその理由を与えなかった。俺たちは生まれた時からライバル関係であり、もうずっと小競り合いを続けている。それからもうひとつ…上位にいると退屈しのぎが必要なんだ。このゲームは俺たちの楽しみであり、残りの陰謀団にとっては恐怖そのものだった」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Modérez votre arrogance, {name}. Yremeryss était aussi rusée que sanguinaire, et si j'avais commis l'erreur de sous-estimer ses capacités et sa force, j'aurais fini dans l'estomac des Ur-Ghuls il y a bien longtemps. Le seul fait qu'elle ait réussi à me supplanter en témoigne. Je ne tenais pas à lui donner des raisons de me bannir comme le dernier des traîtres. Non, notre rivalité, ce petit jeu auquel nous nous livrons depuis notre naissance, était appelée à se jouer sur le long terme. Par ailleurs, il faut bien tromper l'ennui quand on trône au-dessus de la masse. Or, notre compétition avait l'avantage de nous divertir tout en faisant régner la terreur parmi le reste de la Kabale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

Le seul fait qu'elle ait réussi à me supplanter en témoigne. Je ne tenais pas à lui donner des raisons de me bannir comme le dernier des traîtres. Non, notre rivalité, ce petit jeu auquel nous nous livrons depuis notre naissance, était appelée à se jouer sur le long terme. Par ailleurs, il faut bien tromper l'ennui quand on trône au-dessus de la masse. Or, notre compétition avait l'avantage de nous divertir tout en faisant régner la terreur parmi le reste de la Kabale. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Zügelt Eure Arroganz, {name}. Yremeryss war gerissen und tödlich, und hätte ich ihre Fähigkeiten und ihre Stärke unterschätzt, wäre ich schon vor langer Zeit als Futter für die Yr'ghule geendet. Die Tatsache, dass sie mich übertrumpft hat, spricht für sich. Ich habe mich geweigert, Ihr einen Grund zu geben, mich als Verräter zu verstoßen. Nein, unsere Rivalität, unser kleines Spiel, das seit unserer Geburt gelaufen war, hat Zeit gekostet. Und noch etwas: Wenn man an der Spitze steht, braucht man etwas, um die Langeweile fernzuhalten. Dieses Spiel hat uns amüsiert und den Rest der Kabale terrorisiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

Yremeryss ist gerissen und tödlich, und hätte ich ihre Fähigkeiten und ihre Stärke unterschätzt, wäre ich schon vor langer Zeit als Futter für die Yr'ghule geendet. Die Tatsache, dass sie mich übertrumpft hat, spricht für sich. Ich habe mich geweigert, Ihr einen Grund zu geben, mich als Verräter zu verstoßen. Nein, unsere Rivalität, unser kleines Spiel, das seit unserer Geburt läuft, hat Zeit gekostet. Und noch etwas: Wenn man an der Spitze steht, braucht man etwas, um die Langeweile fernzuhalten. Dieses Spiel hat uns amüsiert und den Rest der Kabale terrorisiert."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, . Yremeryss is clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that has been running since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game has amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Hadsizliğin lüzumu yok {name}. Yremeryss, hem zeki hem de kuvvetliydi. Gücünü, kabiliyetini hafife almak, peşinen ur-gûllara yem olmak demekti. Benden yüksekte oluşu bile bunu kanıtlar nitelikte. Beni hain belleyip dışlaması için bahane vermek istemedim. İşin aslı... Rekabetimiz, doğduğumuzdan beri süregelen bir oyundan ibaret. Hem zirvede olunca sıkıntıdan ne yapacağını da biraz şaşırıyorsun. Bu oyunlar bizi eğlendirdi, Kabal'ı dehşete sürükledi."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Keep your arrogance in check, {name}. Yremeryss was clever and deadly, and if I had underestimated her abilities and strength, I would have been food for the ur-ghuls long ago. The very fact that she surpassed me speaks for itself. I refused to give her cause to cast me out as a traitor. No, our rivalry, our little game that ran since our birth, took time. And another thing... when you are at the top, you need something to stave off boredom. This game amused us and terrorised the rest of the Kabal."

Gücünü, kabiliyetini hafife almak, peşinen ur-ghul'lara yem olmak demekti. Benden yüksekte oluşu bile bunu kanıtlar nitelikte. Beni hain belleyip dışlaması için bahane vermek istemedim. İşin aslı... Rekabetimiz, doğduğumuzdan beri süregelen bir oyundan ibaret. Hem zirvede olunca sıkıntıdan ne yapacağını da biraz şaşırıyorsun. Bu oyunlar bizi eğlendirdi, Kabal'ı dehşete sürükledi."
